thread.title: Hrithik Roshan's 'Mohenjo fun' with co-star Pooja Hegde
thread.title_full: Hrithik Roshan's 'Mohenjo fun' with co-star Pooja Hegde - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: Hrithik Roshan's 'Mohenjo fun' with co-star Pooja Hegde
text:
Hrithik Roshan and Ashutosh Gowariker celebrated Pooja Hegde's birthday on the sets of their film 'Mohenjo Daro'. Hrithik Roshan took to Twitter to wish his co-star and shared an intriguing photo from the sets.
Wata MOHENJO FUN day!Al danced 4 d lovely birthday girl! @hegdepooja Ty 4 being d bright lite dat u r!keep shining! pic.twitter.com/4XX62ugsQY 
â€” Hrithik Roshan (@iHrithik) October 13, 2015 Also read:  Manish Chaudhari celebrates birthday on sets of 'Mohenjo Daro' 
'Mohenjo Daro' will mark Pooja Hegde's Bollywood debut. She has earlier starred in Tamil film 'Mugamoodi' and Telugu movies 'Oka Laila Kosam' and 'Mukunda'.
Also read:  Hrithik Roshan to fight with tigers in 'Mohenjo Daro'! 
Recently, buzz had it that the film's shoot was put on hold for a few days owing to  Hrithik Roshan's back pain. (Read the full story) 
Directed by Ashutosh Gowariker, 'Mohenjo Daro' is a love story set in the Indus Valley civilization. It has been extensively shot in Bhuj.
